content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ join us for a crochet along during the month of september the lovely lace crochet sweater will be available for free on the blog to sign up and get the schedule visit https //checkout brianakdesigns com/lovely-lace-crochet-sweater/ 1 want to know what is in the vip experience immediate access to crochet along schedule & materials list - get planning need to know details - all the information is organized in one place with links to blog posts all about yarn guide - learn about yarn choices & fibers coupon code - an exclusive coupon code for a 20% discount on the yarn used for the lace sleeve sweater bonus enchanted crochet poncho - pdf pattern + video measurement guide - understand how to measure your body and pick the correct pattern size $10 gift card - spend it in my ravelry shop limited time only must sign up by september 20th 2023 project planner - print and stay organized as you craft your sweater we forget over 70% of what is taught in training sessions get unlimited access and here is even more reasons why you should join us in a cal these aren t short row this is made in one piece and in the round video tutorial yes sizes xs to 5x i m debuting a new pdf pattern format i can t wait for you to see it there is a vip experience available at an amazing price with an incredible bonus pattern you have to see like it s freaking amazing and you need to go see it did you know with a top-down construction you have complete flexibility on length if you want a crop top simply crochet fewer single-crochet rounds on the body use the shaping suggestions to make it more form-fitting especially around the hips this lovely lace crochet sweater has a stitch video tutorial for the split single_crochet https //brianakdesigns com/split-single-crochet-roundflat/ **crochet hook ** hook size e 3 5mm 2 used for the neck ribbing hook size g 4 0mm 3 used for the rest of the sweater **notations ** removable stitch marker 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 winding kit to cake yarn 7 blocking mat 8 & pins 9 **yarn ** wecrochet heatherly sport 10 80% acrylic 20% merino wool 328yds/100g **yarn quantities ** 1025 1075 1250 1400 1500 1800 2075 2225 2400 yds 4 4 4 5 5 6 7 7 8 hanks of yarn **yarn substitutes ** cotton kings 100% cotton 875yds/200g weight sport shown as short sleeve in images brava sport 100% premium acrylic 340yds/100g wool of the andes sport 100% peruvian highland wool 137yds/50g upcycle alpaca blend sport 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 273yds/100g galileo 50% merino wool 50% viscose from bamboo 131yds/50g **sizing ** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34
